snippet: Primer, a product said to fill in fine lines and enlarged pores on the skin before using foundation makeup, is getting more popular, and increasingly specialized.
abstract: Primer, cosmetic product used to fill in fine lines and enlarged pores on the skin before applying foundation makeup, is getting more popular, and increasingly specialized; beauty companies are creating new primers not only for skin and eyelids, but also for eyelashes, lips, nails and even hair.
lead_paragraph: Primer, a product said to fill in fine lines and enlarged pores on the skin before using foundation makeup, is getting more popular, and increasingly specialized.
